review.title: “COMPANY CHANGES MANAGEMENT AND THE EMPLOYEES DON'T MATTER ANYMORE”
review.pros: Pros – Really great people work there and it used to be a good place to work.
review.cons: Cons – Owner doesn't care about the company or the employees at all. He is just in it for the money for himself. You get criticized and yelled at. After their recent change in management the company has gone down the tubes. Nobody communicates and you get blamed for everything that goes wrong. The owner simply does not care anymore. He should sell the company. Everyone would be better off.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Realize that your people are the company and treat them right and get the owner back on board to care about what is going on with his company.
